amendment.description: To use $800,000,000 of the Elementary and Secondary School Emergency Relief Fund to identify and provide homeless children and youth with wrap-around services in light of the challenges of COVID-19 and other assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1233 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1260; text: CR S1260) To use $800,000,000 of the Elementary and Secondary School Emergency Relief Fund to identify and provide homeless children and youth with wrap-around services in light of the challenges of COVID-19 and other assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1233 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 891.
